title.narrative: We Effect EU own contribution Guatemala 2018-2021

description.narrative: Insatsens övergripande mål är att "contribute to the reduction of rural poverty, employment generation and to improving the quality of life of indigenous women/men/small holder farmers, producers of coffee, panela and vegetables, favoring inclusive and sustainable economic growth in six Departments of Guatemala". Insatsens specifika mål är att "improve the production, competitiveness and commercial capacity of a set of cooperatives, MSMEs and social economy organisations of six Departments of the Altiplano de Guatemala in the value chains of coffee, panela and organic vegetables". Insatsen förväntas uppnå följande resultat: Result 1: Cooperatives, MSMEs and producer groups are strengthened and have consolidated their production and marketing models and expanded their access to organic coffee and panela markets within a framework of rural competitiveness, inclusive development, decent employment and social economy, in six Departments of Guatemala (Sololá, Quetzaltenango, Huehuetenango, Chimaltenango, San Marcos and Quiché). Result 2: Cooperatives and women producer groups have designed and strengthened a production and marketing model and expanded their access to organic vegetable markets within the framework of rural competitiveness, inclusive development, decent employment and social economy approach in three Departments of Guatemala (Sololá, Quetzaltenango and Quiché). Result 3: Public-private partnerships established to improve access to markets and competitiveness from an inclusive approach to rural development, gender and rights. Result 4: Increase in citizen valuation towards responsible consumption, organic products and production by women, locally and nationally.

We Effect har ansökt om finansiering av egeninsats om 10 250 000 SEK för EU-projektet "Apoyo a la competitividad rural campesina-indígena en las cadenas de café, panela y hortalizas" under perioden 2018-2021 i Guatemala.
Insatsen syftar till att förbättra produktionen, konkurrenskraften och den kommersiella kapaciteten hos en uppsättning kooperativ, MSMEs och socioekonomiska organisationer i Guatemala.
Insatsen har en total budget på 5 000 000 EUR, vilket motsvarar cirka 55 178 000 SEK. Sökt stöd från Sida är 10 250 000 SEK, vilket motsvarar 20 procent av den totala budgeten.

We Effect has applied to Sida for funding of 10 250 000 SEK to carry out the EU project "Apoyo a la competitividad rural campesina-indígena en las cadenas de café, panela y hortalizas" in Guatemala during the period 2018-2021.
The contribution aims at improving the production, competitiveness and commercial capacity of a set of cooperatives, MSMEs and social economy organisations in Guatemala.
The contribution's total budget is 5 000 000 EUR, corresponding to approximately 55 178 000 SEK. The requested support from Sida is 10 250 000 SEK, which corresponds to 20 per cent of the total budget.

tag.narrative: 1.4 - By 2030, ensure that all men and women, in particular the poor and the vulnerable, have equal rights to economic resources, as well as access to basic services, ownership and control over land and other forms of property, inheritance, natural resources, appropriate new technology and financial services, including microfinance.

1.4 - Senast 2030 säkerställa att alla män och kvinnor, i synnerhet de fattiga och de utsatta, har lika rätt till ekonomiska resurser, tillgång till grundläggande tjänster, möjlighet att äga och kontrollera mark och andra former av egendom samt tillgång till arv, naturresurser, lämplig ny teknik och finansiella tjänster, inklusive mikrokrediter.
